Hi my name is John

I could use a couple of tips for integrating Junit into Visual Age for java

I followed the steps outlined in the website.

Created a new project for one of my working tests

Put it in the project path for junit.textui.TestRunner

But when I run the test it fails telling me "Could not invoke the suite() method"

It can not find the static suite test method.

Another problem I am having is that in spite of the fact that I imported the source jar, when I double click
on a class VA tells me that it has been imported from a class file. Also as a result I can not single step through
the code.

Any help would be appreciated

Thanks
subject: Integrating JUNIT with Visual Age
